name: Geflect
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam.

In this game you move, dodge, defend and attack with one button! click the left mouse button to Slash and deflect your enemies attacks back on them!

its our first game jam, and the most satisfying game we have ever made. There are 10 waves in the game, each one is harder than the one before... so be ready to die.... a lot......

follow: https://itch.io/profile/gallahat
follow: https://gaziter.itch.io/

Credits:
Programming: Gal Lahat (@Gallahat)
Graphics and music: Asaf Gazit (@Gaziter)

(it was really made in 48 hours, even we can't believe it)
